data.title: Apostolos Lerios; resume
data.text:
Apostolos Lerios, Dirk Stoop, Ryan Mack, Lubomir Bourdev, and Balmanohar Paluri. Methods and Systems for Differentiating Synthetic and Non-Synthetic Images. Filing 2/28/2013 as 13/781,632.

Apostolos Lerios. Systems and Methods for Optimizing Order of Image Transformations. Filing 11/14/12 as 13/677,206.

Apostolos Lerios. Systems and Methods for Lossless Compression of Image Color Profiles. Filing 11/14/12 as 13/677,201.

Apostolos Lerios, Ryan David Mack, Peter Ruibal, and Dirk John Stoop. Systems and Methods for Device-Dependent Image Transformations. Filing 11/6/12 as 13/670,320.

Apostolos Lerios, and Ryan David Mack. Systems and Methods for Lossy Compression of Image Color Profiles. Filing 8/22/12 as 13/591,948.

Apostolos Lerios, Jennifer Dolson, John Pottebaum, and Dirk John Stoop. Systems and Methods for Non-Destructive Editing of Social Images. Filing 8/16/12 as 13/587,837.

Apostolos Lerios, and Jennifer Dolson. Texture Repository for Image Processing Applications. Filing 12/27/11 as 13/338,016.

Apostolos Lerios. Language Translation Using Preprocessor Macros. Filing 12/16/11 as 13/328,049.

Emilio Camahort, Apostolos Lerios, and Don Fussell. Uniformly Sampled Light Fields. Proceedings of the 9th Eurographics Workshop on Rendering (Vienna, Austria, June 29-July 1, 1998). In G. Drettakis, N. Max, eds, Rendering Techniques '98, Berlin, Germany: Springer-Verlag, 1998.

Muhammad Ziaullah Khan Chishti, Apostolos Lerios, et al. Method and System for Incrementally Moving Teeth. Provisional filing 6/20/97 as 60/050,324; filing 10/10/97 as 08/947,080.
